Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
To be used with STATA utility algorithm version 12 and SPSS utility algorithm version 15 and Excel Unweighted scoring version 2. (* Include response 'once or twice a week' in question 6.)
<font color="red"> Click the choice that best describes your situation as it has been over the past week </font>
Field.ElementLabel:
Q1 How much energy do you have to do the things you want to do?
I am

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, always full of energy 
 2, usually full of energy 
 3, occasionally energetic 
 4, usually tired and lacking energy 
 5, always tired and lacking energy.

Field.ElementLabel: Q2 How often do you feel socially excluded or left out?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, rarely 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, always

Field.ElementLabel: Q3 How easy or difficult is it for you to get around by yourself outside your place of residence (eg. to go shopping, visiting)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, getting around is enjoyable and easy 
 2, I have no difficulty getting around outside my place of residence 
 3, a little difficulty 
 4, moderate difficulty 
 5, a lot of difficulty 
 6, I cannot get around unless somebody is there to help me.

StructuredValue.Value: getting around is enjoyable and easy
I have no difficulty getting around outside my place of residence
I cannot get around unless somebody is there to help me.

Field.ElementLabel: Q4 Does your health affect your role in your community (eg. residential, sporting, church or cultural activities)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, my role in the community is unaffected by my health 
 2, there are some parts of my community role I cannot carry out 
 3, there are many parts of my community role I cannot carry out 
 4, I cannot carry out any part of my community role

StructuredValue.Value: my role in the community is unaffected by my health
there are some parts of my community role I cannot carry out
there are many parts of my community role I cannot carry out
I cannot carry out any part of my community role

Field.ElementLabel: Q5 How often do you feel sad?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, rarely 
 3, some of the time 
 4, usually 
 5, nearly all the time.

Field.ElementLabel: Q6 How often do you experience serious pain? I experience it

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, very rarely 
 2, less than once a week 
 3, once or twice a week* 
 4, three to four times a week 
 5, most of the time.

StructuredValue.Value: three to four times a week

Field.ElementLabel: Q7 How much confidence do you have in yourself?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Complete confidence 
 2, A lot 
 3, A moderate amount 
 4, A little 
 5, None at all

Field.ElementLabel: Q8 Do you normally feel calm and tranquil or agitated? I am

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, always calm and tranquil 
 2, usually calm and tranquil 
 3, sometimes calm and tranquil, sometimes agitated 
 4, usually agitated 
 5, always agitated

Field.ElementLabel: Q9 Does your health affect your relationship with your family?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, my role in the family is unaffected by my health 
 2, there are some parts of my family role I cannot carry out 
 3, there are many parts of my family role I cannot carry out 
 4, I cannot carry out any part of my family role.

StructuredValue.Value: my role in the family is unaffected by my health
there are some parts of my family role I cannot carry out
there are many parts of my family role I cannot carry out
I cannot carry out any part of my family role.

Field.ElementLabel: Q10 How satisfying are your close relationships (family and friends)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, very satisfying 
 2, satisfying 
 3, neither satisfying nor dissatisfying 
 4, dissatisfying 
 5, unpleasant 
 6, very unpleasant

Field.ElementLabel: Q11 How well do you communicate with others (talking, signing, texting, being understood by others and understanding them)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, I have no trouble being understood 
 2, I have some difficulty being understood by people who do not know me. 
 3, I am understood only by people who know me. 
 4, I cannot adequately communicate with others.

StructuredValue.Value: I have no trouble being understood
I have some difficulty being understood by people who do not know me.
I am understood only by people who know me.
I cannot adequately communicate with others.

Field.ElementLabel: Q12 How often do you have trouble sleeping?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, almost never 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, all the time

Field.ElementLabel: Q13 How often do you feel worthless?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, almost never 
 3, sometimes 
 4, usually 
 5, always

Field.ElementLabel: Q14 How often do you feel angry?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, almost never 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, all the time

Field.ElementLabel: Q15 How easy or difficult is it for you to move around (using any aids or equipment you need eg a wheelchair, frame or stick)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, I am very mobile 
 2, I have no difficulty with mobility 
 3, I have some difficulty with mobility (for example, going uphill) 
 4, I have difficulty with mobility.I can go short distances only 
 5, I have a lot of difficulty with mobility. I need someone to help me 
 6, I am bedridden.

StructuredValue.Value: I have no difficulty with mobility
I have some difficulty with mobility (for example
I have difficulty with mobility.I can go short distances only
I have a lot of difficulty with mobility. I need someone to help me

Field.ElementLabel: Q16 Do you ever feel like hurting yourself?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, rarely
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, all the time

Field.ElementLabel: Q17 How enthusiastic do you feel?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, extremely 
 2, very 
 3, somewhat 
 4, not much 
 5, not at all

Field.ElementLabel: Q18 How often did you feel worried in the last seven days?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, occasionally 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, all the time.

Field.ElementLabel: Q19 How difficult is it for you to wash, toilet, dress yourself, eat or care for your appearance?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, these things are very easy for me to do 
 2, I have no real difficulty in doing these things 
 3, I find some of these things difficult, but I manage to do them on my own 
 4, many of these things are difficult, and I need help to do them 
 5, I cannot do these things by myself at all

StructuredValue.Value: these things are very easy for me to do
I have no real difficulty in doing these things
I find some of these things difficult
many of these things are difficult
I cannot do these things by myself at all

Field.ElementLabel: Q20 How often do you feel happy?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, all the time 
 2, mostly 
 3, sometimes 
 4, almost never 
 5, never

Field.ElementLabel: Q21 How much do you feel you can cope with life's problems?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, completely 
 2, mostly 
 3, partly 
 4, very little 
 5, not at all

Field.ElementLabel: Q22 How much pain or discomfort do you experience:

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, none at all 
 2, I have moderate pain 
 3, I suffer from severe pain 
 4, I suffer unbearable pain

Field.ElementLabel: Q23 How much do you enjoy your close relationships (family and friends)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, immensely 
 2, a lot 
 3, a little 
 4, not much 
 5, I hate it

Field.ElementLabel: Q24 How often does pain interfere with your usual activities?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, rarely 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, always

Field.ElementLabel: Q25 How often do you feel pleasure?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, always 
 2, usually 
 3, sometimes 
 4, almost never 
 5, never

Field.ElementLabel: Q26 How much of a burden do you feel you are to other people?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, Not at all 
 2, A little 
 3, A moderate amount 
 4, A lot 
 5, totally

Field.ElementLabel: Q27 How content are you with your life?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, extremely 
 2, mainly 
 3, moderately 
 4, slightly 
 5, not at all

Field.ElementLabel: Q28 How well can you see (using your glasses or contact lenses if they are needed)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, I have excellent sight 
 2, I see normally 
 3, I have some difficulty seeing things sharply. (e.g. small print, objects in the distance, or watching television) 
 4, I have a lot of difficulty seeing sharply. 
 5, I only see general shapes. 
 6, I am completely blind

StructuredValue.Value: I have some difficulty seeing things sharply. (e.g. small print
I have a lot of difficulty seeing sharply.

Field.ElementLabel: Q29 How often do you feel in control of your life?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, always 
 2, mostly 
 3, sometimes 
 4, only occasionally 
 5, never

Field.ElementLabel: Q30 How much help do you need with jobs around your place of residence (eg preparing food, cleaning, gardening)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, I can do all these tasks very easily without any help 
 2, I can do these tasks relatively easily without help 
 3, I can do these tasks only very slowly without help 
 4, I cannot do most of these tasks unless I have help 
 5, I can do none of these tasks by myself

StructuredValue.Value: I can do all these tasks very easily without any help
I can do these tasks relatively easily without help
I can do these tasks only very slowly without help
I cannot do most of these tasks unless I have help
I can do none of these tasks by myself

Field.ElementLabel: Q31 How often do you feel socially isolated?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, rarely 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, always

Field.ElementLabel: Q32 How well can you hear (using your hearing aid if needed)?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, I have excellent hearing 
 2, I hear normally 
 3, I have some difficulty hearing or I do not hear clearly (eg when there is background noise) 
 4, I have difficulty hearing things clearly. Often I do not understand what is said. I usually do not take part in conversations because I cannot hear what is said. 
 5, I hear very little 
 6, I am completely deaf

StructuredValue.Value: I have some difficulty hearing or I do not hear clearly (eg when there is background noise)
I have difficulty hearing things clearly. Often I do not understand what is said. I usually do not take part in conversations because I cannot hear what is said.

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, almost never 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, very often 
 6, all the time

Field.ElementLabel: Q34 How happy are you with your close and intimate relationships?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, very happy 
 2, generally happy 
 3, neither happy nor unhappy 
 4, generally unhappy 
 5, very unhappy

Field.ElementLabel: Q35 How often did you feel in despair in the last seven days?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
1, never 
 2, occasionally 
 3, sometimes 
 4, often 
 5, all the time
